---
title: "Sesión sincrónica 01-04-2023"
format: html
---


# Funciones - Métodos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a <- list(2, 1, 4)
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[[1]]
[1] 2

[[2]]
[1] 1

[[3]]
[1] 4
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
length(a)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 3
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
class(a)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "list"
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
round(1.345, 1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1.3
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
help(round)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
starting httpd help server ... done
```


:::
:::


# Arrays en R

## Vectores


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
peso_kg <- c(65.3, 82.5, 57.5, 82, 77.7)
altura_m <- c(1.68, 1.75, 1.62, 1.80, 1.72)

peso_kg / altura_m^2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 23.13634 26.93878 21.90977 25.30864 26.26420
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
altura_m > 1.70
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
altura_m[altura_m > 1.70]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1.75 1.80 1.72
```


:::
:::



## Diccionarios (listas)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
diccionario <- list(
  Nombre = c('Pepito', 'Juanita', 'Pepita', 'Bill', 'Jenny'),
  Peso = peso_kg,
  Altura = altura_m
)

diccionario
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
$Nombre
[1] "Pepito"  "Juanita" "Pepita"  "Bill"    "Jenny"  

$Peso
[1] 65.3 82.5 57.5 82.0 77.7

$Altura
[1] 1.68 1.75 1.62 1.80 1.72
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
names(diccionario)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Nombre" "Peso"   "Altura"
```


:::
:::



# Introducción al [`tidyverse`](https://www.tidyverse.org/)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.3.3
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::
:::


## Dataframes desde una lista (diccionario)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data.frame(diccionario)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   Nombre Peso Altura
1  Pepito 65.3   1.68
2 Juanita 82.5   1.75
3  Pepita 57.5   1.62
4    Bill 82.0   1.80
5   Jenny 77.7   1.72
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tabla <- data.frame(diccionario)
head(tabla, 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   Nombre Peso Altura
1  Pepito 65.3   1.68
2 Juanita 82.5   1.75
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rownames(tabla) <- c("P1", "P2", "P3", "P4", "P5")
tabla
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    Nombre Peso Altura
P1  Pepito 65.3   1.68
P2 Juanita 82.5   1.75
P3  Pepita 57.5   1.62
P4    Bill 82.0   1.80
P5   Jenny 77.7   1.72
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(tabla)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Nombre" "Peso"   "Altura"
```


:::
:::



## Dataframe desde un archivo *.csv*

- [1000 Empresas más grandes de Colombia (2017-2018)](https://www.datos.gov.co/Econom-a-y-Finanzas/1000-Empresas-mas-grandes-del-pa-s/8hn7-rpp8)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df_csv <- read_csv("1000_Empresas_mas_grandes_del_pa_s.csv")
head(df_csv)
```
:::


- Exportamos este archivo a excel:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(writexl)
write_xlsx(df_csv, "empresas_colombia2.xlsx")
```
:::



## Dataframe desde un archivo de excel


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
df_excel <- read_excel("empresas_colombia2.xlsx")
head(df_excel, 5)
```
:::
